res=$(CocoaDialog inputbox --title "Wrap Size" \ --informative-text "Enter a character width:" \ --button1 "Build Snippet" --button2 "Cancel")
[[ $(head -n1 <<<"$res") == "2" ]] && exit_discard
res=$(tail -n1 <<<"$res") ruby <<END print %Q{gsub!(/(.{1,$res}|\\\\S{#{$res + 1},})(?:\\\\s+|\$)/, "\\\\\\\\1\\\\n")} END
